item.title: [PI]Better Hunter
item.dc:creator: @grim4reaper grim4reaper
item.description:
@grim4reaper wrote:

This hunter base uses static methods and enumerators which uses less resources.
Also i implemented all the hunting data inside the hunter class which makes it easier to edit and makes more sense.

Replace your Hunter class with this:

[CODE]package server.model.players.skills;

import server.model.players.Client;
import server.Config;
import server.util.Misc;

public class Hunter {

public enum Impling {
	Baby_Impling("Baby Impling", 10010,6055,11238,20,1),
	Young_Impling("Young Impling", 10010, 6056, 11240, 48, 20),
	Gourmet_Impling("Gourmet Impling", 10010, 6057, 11242, 82, 20),
	Earth_Impling("Earth Impling", 10010, 6058, 11244, 126, 34),
	Essence_Impling("Essence Impling", 10010, 6059, 11246, 160, 40),
	Electric_Impling("Electric Impling", 10010, 6060, 11248, 205, 50),
	Nature_Impling("Nature Impling", 10010, 6061, 11250, 250, 58),
	Magpie_Impling("Magpie Impling", 10010, 6062, 11252, 289, 65),
	Ninja_Impling("Ninja Impling", 10010, 6063, 11254, 339, 74),
	Dragon_Impling("Dragon Impling", 10010, 6064, 11256, 390, 90);
	
	private Impling(String npcName, int Net,int npcId, int itemId, int AmtExp, int Req) {
		this.name = npcName;
		this.Net = Net;
		this.npcId = npcId;
		this.itemId = itemId;
		this.AmtExp = AmtExp;
		this.Req = Req;
	}
	
	private String name = "";
	private int Net, npcId, itemId, AmtExp, Req;
	
	public String getImpName(){
		return name;
	}
	
	public int getNet(){
		return Net;
	}
	
	public int getNpcId(){
		return npcId;
	}
	
	public int getItemId(){
		return itemId;
	}
	
	public int getExp(){
		return AmtExp;
	}
	
	public int getReq(){
		return Req;
	}
	
	public static Impling forId(int npcId) {
		for (Impling impling : Impling.values()) {
			if (impling.getNpcId() == npcId) {
				return impling;
			}
		}
		return null;
	}
}

public enum Butterfly {
	RUBY_HARVEST("Ruby Harvest", 10010, 5085, 10020, 150, 30),
	Sapphire_Glacialis("Sapphire Glacialis", 10010, 5084, 10018, 200, 45),
	Snowy_Knight("Snowy Knight", 10010, 5083, 10016, 250, 75),
	Black_Warlock("Black Warlock", 10010, 5082, 10014, 325, 85);
	
	private Butterfly(String npcName, int Net,int npcId, int itemId, int AmtExp, int Req) {
		this.name = npcName;
		this.Net = Net;
		this.npcId = npcId;
		this.itemId = itemId;
		this.AmtExp = AmtExp;
		this.Req = Req;
	}
	
	private String name = "";
	private int Net, npcId, itemId, AmtExp, Req;
	
	public String getName(){
		return name;
	}
	
	public int getNet(){
		return Net;
	}
	
	public int getNpcId(){
		return npcId;
	}
	
	public int getItemId(){
		return itemId;
	}
	
	public int getExp(){
		return AmtExp;
	}
	
	public int getReq(){
		return Req;
	}
	
	public static Butterfly forId(int npcId) {
		for (Butterfly butterfly : Butterfly.values()) {
			if (butterfly.getNpcId() == npcId) {
				return butterfly;
			}
		}
		return null;
	}
}

public static void CatchImpling(Client c, int npcId) {
	Impling imp = Impling.forId(npcId);
	int equipped = c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon];
	if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay >= 1500) {
		if (c.playerLevel[21] >= imp.getReq()) {
			if (equipped == imp.getNet()) {
				if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(11260, 1)) {
					if (c.hasSpace()) {
						c.getItems().deleteItem(11260, 1);
						HandleCatch(c, imp.getItemId(), imp.getExp(), imp.getReq(), imp.getImpName());
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("Not enough inventory space.");
						return;
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("you need a impling jar to catch this");
					return;
				}
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You need to equip a butterfly net!");
				return;
			}
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need atleast " + imp.getReq()
					+ " Hunter To catch that Impling!");
			return;
		}
		c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
	}
}

public static void CatchButterfly(Client c, int npcId) {
	Butterfly butterfly = Butterfly.forId(npcId);
	int equipped = c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon];
	if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay > 1500) { 
		if (c.playerLevel[21] >= butterfly.getReq()) { 
			if (equipped == butterfly.getNet()) {
				if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(10012, 1)) {
					if (c.hasSpace()) {
						c.getItems().deleteItem(10012, 1);
						HandleCatch(c, butterfly.getItemId(), butterfly.getExp(), butterfly.getReq(), butterfly.getName());
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("Not enough inventory space.");
						return;
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("you need a impling jar to catch this");
					return;
				}
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You need to be wearing a butterfly net!");
				return;
			}
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need at least " + butterfly.getReq()
					+ " Hunter To catch that Butterfly!");
			return;
		}
		c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
	}
}

public static void RefreshRabbits(Client c) {
	c.getPA().object(19337, 2142, 5106, 0, 10);
	c.getPA().object(19337, 2143, 5106, 0, 10);
	c.getPA().object(19337, 2144, 5106, 0, 10);
	c.getPA().object(19337, 2145, 5106, 0, 10);
	c.getPA().object(19337, 2146, 5106, 0, 10);
	c.getPA().object(19337, 2147, 5106, 0, 10);
}

public static void HandleCatch(Client c, int ID, int XP, int Req, String Name) {
	if (c.playerLevel[21] + Misc.random(10) > Misc.random(20) + Req) {
		c.sendMessage("You Cought a " + Name + "!");
		c.getItems().addItem(ID, 1);
		c.startAnimation(6999);
		c.getPA().addSkillXP(XP * Config.HUNTER_EXPERIENCE, 21);
	} else {
		c.sendMessage("You Failed To Catch The " + Name + ".");
		c.startAnimation(6999);
	}
}

public static void giveRabbit(Client c) {
	if (Misc.random(10) < 3) {
		if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
			c.getItems().addItem(3226, 1);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("Not enough inventory space");
		}
	} else {
		c.sendMessage("you fail to catch the rabbit.");
	}
}

}[/CODE]

Now go into ActionHandler class and search:

You will see somthing like this:

Change those using this format:

then search:

replace all those with these:

Now open up Config.java and either edit if you have or add this:

That makes the experience 15x the normal runescape xp rate for those implings/butterflies

If you do not have rabbit holes added yet, follow these next steps:

add this under object first click in actionhandler :

[CODE]case 19337:
int X = c.objectX;
int Y = c.objectY;
c.getPA().object(-1, X, Y, 0, 10);
c.rabbitNeedSpawn = true;
c.rabbitTimer = 15;
c.getPA().addSkillXP(1500, 21);
c.getPA().object(19338, X, Y, 0, 10);
c.sendMessage(“you flush the rabbit out the hole and find a rabbit”);
Hunter.giveRabbit©;

	break;[/CODE]

now add this in your client.java at the top near all the other int’s :

public boolean rabbitNeedSpawn = false; public int rabbitTimer = 0;

Now search process() and add this in there:

if (rabbitNeedSpawn == true && rabbitTimer <= 0){ RefreshRabbits(); }else{ rabbitTimer -- ; }

Then add these methods somewhere in your Client class:

[CODE]public void RefreshRabbits() {
getPA().object(19337, 2257, 3336, 0, 10);
getPA().object(19337, 2261, 3334, 1, 10);
}

public void giveRabbit() {
if (Misc.random(10) <= 2){
if (Misc.random(25) == 1){
getItems().addItem(10132, 1);
}else{
getItems().addItem(3226, 1);
}
}else{
sendMessage(“you fail to catch the rabbit.”);
}[/CODE]

If any errors, let me know. Thank if used, feedback welcome. Flames not welcome.

Credits to Mr Jin for influencing me to learn enum’s

Read full topic
